titles.title: Expressing support for the recognition of September 2024 as "National Children's Emotional Wellness Month" and for increased public awareness regarding children's emotional health and wellness.
Expressing support for the recognition of September 2024 as "National Children's Emotional Wellness Month" and for increased public awareness regarding children's emotional health and wellness.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Children's Emotional Wellness Month.
